channel.title: Free Rapidshare.com and .de premium links!
channel.description:
Ok I found this site while searching for rapidshare hacks. all you do is this. -------
Step 1: go to www.sharex.org Step 2: register Step 3: log in Step 4: go to http://www.sharex.org/get_links.php Step 5: enter you rapidshare.com links in "Enter Links" section Step 6: Press "get links" Step 7: Your links will come up "e.g. http://dl8l3.rapidshare.com/files/22...2006.part3.rar " Step 8: Copy that link into your favorite Download Manager
---------- Hope you enjoy my find ;), Also hope this gets stickied lol

item.title: Free Rapidshare.com and .de premium links!
item.dc:creator: @subin subin
item.description:
@subin wrote:

Ok I found this site while searching for rapidshare hacks. all you do is this.

Step 1: go to www.sharex.org
Step 2: register
Step 3: log in
Step 4: go to http://www.sharex.org/get_links.php
Step 5: enter you rapidshare.com links in “Enter Links” section
Step 6: Press “get links”
Step 7: Your links will come up "e.g. http://dl8l3.rapidshare.com/files/22...2006.part3.rar "
Step 8: Copy that link into your favorite Download Manager

Hope you enjoy my find ;), Also hope this gets stickied lol
